Installation¶

  1. First, download the archive from github and extract it to any local directory.

  1. You can either add the local directory to your PYTHONPATH

    export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/path/to/local/directory/../pyGP_OO

  2. Or intall the package using setup.py:

    python setup.py intall

Requirements¶

  • python 2.6 or 2.7
  • scipy, numpy, and matplotlib: open-source packages for scientific computing using the Python programming language.
